analysis: The project has undergone comprehensive improvements across multiple areas including code quality, performance optimization, user experience, and developer tooling. Key improvements include error boundaries, theme integration, TypeScript enhancements, loading states, validation middleware, and internationalization utilities. The main remaining focus areas are documentation completeness and design system specification.

improvements.description: Document component design system specifications including spacing, typography, and interaction patterns
Add development environment setup instructions and contribution guidelines
Implement unified loading states and icon positioning system across all button variants
Add internationalization utilities and currency formatting functions
